name: FrogQuest
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for a mini jam!(This was heavily rushed because I missed a day(also my first mini jam game(leave constructive critism)))
You have a short amount of time to reach a.... hole... before the game CLOSES!
The timer starts the second you press "play".

Controls 

Walk - A(left) D(right)

Jump - Space OR mouse0.

I will be adding onto this game in the future.(for now, enjoy this slightly bad game)
